post.title: canon eos 1ds mark iii 21.1 megapixel
post.content: canon eos 1ds mark iii 21.1 megapixel quite pricey at 7 grand, but worth every last penny...plus, you can get it for $1,000 less on craigslist and ebay, now that the downgraded mark iv came out :-p by far, the best digital camera i've ever worked with.
